And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> and spake<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S> again<S>3825</S> by<S>1722</S> parables<S>3850</S>, and said<S>3004</S>,
The kingdom<S>932</S> of heaven<S>3772</S> is like<S>3666</S> unto a certain<S>444</S> king<S>935</S>, which<S>3748</S> made<S>4160</S> a marriage<S>1062</S> for his<S>846</S> son<S>5207</S>,
And<S>2532</S> sent forth<S>649</S> his<S>846</S> servants<S>1401</S> to call<S>2564</S> them that were bidden<S>2564</S> to<S>1519</S> the wedding<S>1062</S>: and<S>2532</S> they would<S>2309</S> not<S>3756</S> come<S>2064</S>.
Again<S>3825</S>, he sent forth<S>649</S> other<S>243</S> servants<S>1401</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Tell<S>2036</S> them which are bidden<S>2564</S>, Behold<S>2400</S>, I have prepared<S>2090</S> my<S>3450</S> dinner<S>712</S>: my<S>3450</S> oxen<S>5022</S> and<S>2532</S> my fatlings<S>4619</S> are killed<S>2380</S>, and<S>2532</S> all things<S>3956</S> are ready<S>2092</S>: come<S>1205</S> unto<S>1519</S> the marriage<S>1062</S>.
But<S>1161</S> they made light of<S>272</S> it, and went their ways<S>565</S>, one<S>3303</S> to<S>1519</S> his<S>2398</S> farm<S>68</S>, another<S>1161</S> to<S>1519</S> his<S>846</S> merchandise<S>1711</S>:
And<S>1161</S> the remnant<S>3062</S> took<S>2902</S> his<S>846</S> servants<S>1401</S>, and entreated them spitefully<S>5195</S>, and<S>2532</S> slew<S>615</S> them.
But<S>1161</S> when the king<S>935</S> heard<S>191</S> thereof, he was wroth<S>3710</S>: and<S>2532</S> he sent forth<S>3992</S> his<S>846</S> armies<S>4753</S>, and destroyed<S>622</S> those<S>1565</S> murderers<S>5406</S>, and<S>2532</S> burned up<S>1714</S> their<S>846</S> city<S>4172</S>.
Then<S>5119</S> saith he<S>3004</S> to his<S>846</S> servants<S>1401</S>,<S>3303</S> The wedding<S>1062</S> is<S>2076</S> ready<S>2092</S>, but<S>1161</S> they which were bidden<S>2564</S> were<S>2258</S> not<S>3756</S> worthy<S>514</S>.
Go ye<S>4198</S> therefore<S>3767</S> into<S>1909</S> the highways<S>1327</S> <S>3598</S>, and<S>2532</S> as many as<S>3745</S> <S>302</S> ye shall find<S>2147</S>, bid<S>2564</S> to<S>1519</S> the marriage<S>1062</S>.
So<S>2532</S> those<S>1565</S> servants<S>1401</S> went out<S>1831</S> into<S>1519</S> the highways<S>3598</S>, and gathered together<S>4863</S> all<S>3956</S> as many as<S>3745</S> they found<S>2147</S>, both<S>5037</S> bad<S>4190</S> and<S>2532</S> good<S>18</S>: and<S>2532</S> the wedding<S>1062</S> was furnished<S>4130</S> with guests<S>345</S>.
And<S>1161</S> when<S>1525</S> the king<S>935</S> came in<S>1525</S> to see<S>2300</S> the guests<S>345</S>, he saw<S>1492</S> there<S>1563</S> a man<S>444</S> which had<S>1746</S> not<S>3756</S> on<S>1746</S> a wedding<S>1062</S> garment<S>1742</S>:
And<S>2532</S> he saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Friend<S>2083</S>, how<S>4459</S> camest thou<S>1525</S> in hither<S>5602</S> not<S>3361</S> having<S>2192</S> a wedding<S>1062</S> garment<S>1742</S>? And<S>1161</S> he was speechless<S>5392</S>.
Then<S>5119</S> said<S>2036</S> the king<S>935</S> to the servants<S>1249</S>, Bind<S>1210</S> him<S>846</S> hand<S>5495</S> and<S>2532</S> foot<S>4228</S>, and take<S>142</S> him<S>846</S> away<S>142</S>, and<S>2532</S> cast<S>1544</S> him into<S>1519</S> outer<S>1857</S> darkness<S>4655</S>; there<S>1563</S> shall be<S>2071</S> weeping<S>2805</S> and<S>2532</S> gnashing<S>1030</S> of teeth<S>3599</S>.
For<S>1063</S> many<S>4183</S> are<S>1526</S> called<S>2822</S>, but<S>1161</S> few<S>3641</S> are chosen<S>1588</S>.
Then<S>5119</S> went<S>4198</S> the Pharisees<S>5330</S>, and took<S>2983</S> counsel<S>4824</S> how<S>3704</S> they might entangle<S>3802</S> him<S>846</S> in<S>1722</S> his talk<S>3056</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they sent out<S>649</S> unto him<S>846</S> their<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> with<S>3326</S> the Herodians<S>2265</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Master<S>1320</S>, we know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> thou art<S>1488</S> true<S>227</S>, and<S>2532</S> teachest<S>1321</S> the way<S>3598</S> of God<S>2316</S> in<S>1722</S> truth<S>225</S>,<S>2532</S> neither<S>3756</S> carest<S>3199</S> thou<S>4671</S> for<S>4012</S> any<S>3762</S> man: for<S>1063</S> thou regardest<S>991</S> not<S>1519</S> <S>3756</S> the person<S>4383</S> of men<S>444</S>.
Tell<S>2036</S> us<S>2254</S> therefore<S>3767</S>, What<S>5101</S> thinkest<S>1380</S> thou<S>4671</S>? Is it lawful<S>1832</S> to give<S>1325</S> tribute<S>2778</S> unto Caesar<S>2541</S>, or<S>2228</S> not<S>3756</S>?
But<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> perceived<S>1097</S> their<S>846</S> wickedness<S>4189</S>, and said<S>2036</S>, Why<S>5101</S> tempt ye<S>3985</S> me<S>3165</S>, ye hypocrites<S>5273</S>?
Shew<S>1925</S> me<S>3427</S> the tribute<S>2778</S> money<S>3546</S>. And<S>1161</S> they brought<S>4374</S> unto him<S>846</S> a penny<S>1220</S>.penny: in value seven pence halfpenny
And<S>2532</S> he saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Whose<S>5101</S> is this<S>3778</S> image<S>1504</S> and<S>2532</S> superscription<S>1923</S>? <sup>superscription: or, inscription</sup>
They say<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Caesar's<S>2541</S>. Then<S>5119</S> saith he<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Render<S>591</S> therefore<S>3767</S> unto Caesar<S>2541</S> the things which are<S>3588</S> Caesar's<S>2541</S>; and<S>2532</S> unto God<S>2316</S> the things that are<S>3588</S> God's<S>2316</S>.
When<S>2532</S> they had heard<S>191</S> these words, they marvelled<S>2296</S>, and<S>2532</S> left<S>863</S> him<S>846</S>, and went their way<S>565</S>.
The same<S>1722</S> <S>1565</S> day<S>2250</S> came<S>4334</S> to him<S>846</S> the Sadducees<S>4523</S>, which<S>3588</S> say<S>3004</S> that there is<S>1511</S> no<S>3361</S> resurrection<S>386</S>, and<S>2532</S> asked<S>1905</S> him<S>846</S>,
Saying<S>3004</S>, Master<S>1320</S>, Moses<S>3475</S> said<S>2036</S>, If<S>1437</S> a man<S>5100</S> die<S>599</S>, having<S>2192</S> no<S>3361</S> children<S>5043</S>, his<S>846</S> brother<S>80</S> shall marry<S>1918</S> his<S>846</S> wife<S>1135</S>, and<S>2532</S> raise up<S>450</S> seed<S>4690</S> unto his<S>846</S> brother<S>80</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> there were<S>2258</S> with<S>3844</S> us<S>2254</S> seven<S>2033</S> brethren<S>80</S>: and<S>2532</S> the first<S>4413</S>, when he had married a wife<S>1060</S>, deceased<S>5053</S>, and<S>2532</S>, having<S>2192</S> no<S>3361</S> issue<S>4690</S>, left<S>863</S> his<S>846</S> wife<S>1135</S> unto his<S>846</S> brother<S>80</S>:
Likewise<S>3668</S> the second<S>1208</S> also<S>2532</S>, and<S>2532</S> the third<S>5154</S>, unto<S>2193</S> the seventh<S>2033</S>. <sup>seventh: Gr. seven</sup>
And<S>1161</S> last<S>5305</S> of all<S>3956</S> the woman<S>1135</S> died<S>599</S> also<S>2532</S>.
Therefore<S>3767</S> in<S>1722</S> the resurrection<S>386</S> whose<S>5101</S> wife<S>1135</S> shall she be<S>2071</S> of the seven<S>2033</S>? for<S>1063</S> they all<S>3956</S> had<S>2192</S> her<S>846</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> and<S>1161</S> said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Ye do err<S>4105</S>, not<S>3361</S> knowing<S>1492</S> the scriptures<S>1124</S>, nor<S>3366</S> the power<S>1411</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
For<S>1063</S> in<S>1722</S> the resurrection<S>386</S> they neither<S>3777</S> marry<S>1060</S>, nor<S>3777</S> are given in marriage<S>1547</S>, but<S>235</S> are<S>1526</S> as<S>5613</S> the angels<S>32</S> of God<S>2316</S> in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>.
But<S>1161</S> as touching<S>4012</S> the resurrection<S>386</S> of the dead<S>3498</S>, have ye<S>314</S> not<S>3756</S> read<S>314</S> that which<S>3588</S> was spoken<S>4483</S> unto you<S>5213</S> by<S>5259</S> God<S>2316</S>, saying<S>3004</S>,
I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> the God<S>2316</S> of Abraham<S>11</S>, and<S>2532</S> the God<S>2316</S> of Isaac<S>2464</S>, and<S>2532</S> the God<S>2316</S> of Jacob<S>2384</S>? God<S>2316</S> is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> the God<S>2316</S> of the dead<S>3498</S>, but<S>235</S> of the living<S>2198</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when the multitude<S>3793</S> heard<S>191</S> this, they were astonished<S>1605</S> at<S>1909</S> his<S>846</S> doctrine<S>1322</S>.
But<S>1161</S> when the Pharisees<S>5330</S> had heard<S>191</S> that<S>3754</S> he had put<S>5392</S> the Sadducees<S>4523</S> to silence<S>5392</S>, they were gathered together<S>4863</S> <S>1909</S> <S>846</S>.
Then<S>2532</S> one<S>1520</S> of<S>1537</S> them<S>846</S>, which was a lawyer<S>3544</S>, asked<S>1905</S> him a question, tempting<S>3985</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> saying<S>3004</S>,
Master<S>1320</S>, which<S>4169</S> is the great<S>3173</S> commandment<S>1785</S> in<S>1722</S> the law<S>3551</S>?
<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Thou shalt love<S>25</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> thy<S>4675</S> God<S>2316</S> with<S>1722</S> all<S>3650</S> thy<S>4675</S> heart<S>2588</S>, and<S>2532</S> with<S>1722</S> all<S>3650</S> thy<S>4675</S> soul<S>5590</S>, and<S>2532</S> with<S>1722</S> all<S>3650</S> thy<S>4675</S> mind<S>1271</S>.
This<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> the first<S>4413</S> and<S>2532</S> great<S>3173</S> commandment<S>1785</S>.
And<S>1161</S> the second<S>1208</S> is like<S>3664</S> unto it<S>846</S> <S>3778</S>, Thou shalt love<S>25</S> thy<S>4675</S> neighbour<S>4139</S> as<S>5613</S> thyself<S>4572</S>.
On<S>1722</S> these<S>5025</S> two<S>1417</S> commandments<S>1785</S> hang<S>2910</S> all<S>3650</S> the law<S>3551</S> and<S>2532</S> the prophets<S>4396</S>.
While<S>1161</S> the Pharisees<S>5330</S> were gathered together<S>4863</S>, Jesus<S>2424</S> asked<S>1905</S> them<S>846</S>,
Saying<S>3004</S>, What<S>5101</S> think<S>1380</S> ye<S>5213</S> of<S>4012</S> Christ<S>5547</S>? whose<S>5101</S> son<S>5207</S> is he<S>2076</S>? They say<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, The Son of David<S>1138</S>.
He saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, How<S>4459</S> then<S>3767</S> doth David<S>1138</S> in<S>1722</S> spirit<S>4151</S> call<S>2564</S> him<S>846</S> Lord<S>2962</S>, saying<S>3004</S>,
The LORD<S>2962</S> said<S>2036</S> unto my<S>3450</S> Lord<S>2962</S>, Sit thou<S>2521</S> on<S>1537</S> my<S>3450</S> right hand<S>1188</S>, till<S>2193</S> <S>302</S> I make<S>5087</S> thine<S>4675</S> enemies<S>2190</S> thy<S>4675</S> footstool<S>5286</S> <S>4228</S>?
If<S>1487</S> David<S>1138</S> then<S>3767</S> call<S>2564</S> him<S>846</S> Lord<S>2962</S>, how<S>4459</S> is he<S>2076</S> his<S>846</S> son<S>5207</S>?
And<S>2532</S> no man<S>3762</S> was able<S>1410</S> to answer<S>611</S> him<S>846</S> a word<S>3056</S>, neither<S>3761</S> durst<S>5111</S> any<S>5100</S> man from<S>575</S> that<S>1565</S> day<S>2250</S> forth ask<S>1905</S> him<S>846</S> any more<S>3765</S> questions.
